refnamediv.refpurpose: A street name, number, and other related information

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The street element contains what is commonly the first line of an address in a Western addresses: a street name and number. It could also contain an apartment number, suite number or other similar information, although this information is often included in street2.

The second line of the street part of an address may be specified using the street2 element. However, a future version of the &library.name; will instead allow multiple street elements inside a single address, allowing for as many lines as needed.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: street may be contained in these elements: <$PARENTS$>

listitem.para: A string used to uniquely identify a street. The street may then be referred to by this identifier.
